title: The Wizard's Tale
description: Baleron, the ilyff wizard, and Vandrik, the Guardian of Fire, suspect the mysterious disappearance of their beloved Queen Ortana to be the work of an old, forgotten enemy–the gorglores.It can only be assumed the gorglores are, once again, after what they have always desired–the Sword of Fieras; one of the four most powerful weapons in all the land. However, once Vandrik and the others set out on their journey to rescue the Queen, they soon realize there may be something far more sinister and evil at work; something that’s been patiently waiting in the shadows for just the right opportunity to reveal itself.
author: Kirk Hisko
